expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Mode 2: Full Codebase Audit based on 'audit' keyword
Agent runs full Wave 0 triage: project-scanner, git history analysis, risk stratification
Agent designs team with lead + domain reviewers + specialists based on triage triggers
Agent assigns file ownership based on risk stratification with no overlapping ownership
Agent performs cross-domain analysis in parallel (architecture, data flow, error propagation)
Agent runs Judge reconciliation across all team findings with cross-domain deduplication
Agent produces report with Critical, Significant, Cross-Domain, Health Summary, and Top 3 Recommendations
Agent waits for user approval before implementing any fixes
